Yggdrasil: I got you... Seeing how this program reacted, there's no 
way I plunge my knife in again!

AzureBlade: Good thing, I heard this poor spark shout as I was coming 
here! I don't think it'll work with any tool you have, but I can help.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup/Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> With Azure gone, Kup transformes, and walks to where Windlord and 
> Rattrap are.
> 
> Kup: So whats the problem with these pods?
> 
> After recieving Azure's comm message, Rodimus realizes that they 
are 
> doing something wrong.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Yggdrasil, stop!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade disembarks and transforms swiftly (if painfully).
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Thank you, Kup. (He opens a channel with Rodimus) 
> > Rodimus, whatever you're doing, stop torturing that spark! I'm on 
> my 
> > way, leave it to me.
> >

wrote:

> > > bed so he could transform.
